alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:23PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN YAZOO AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 1023 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tchula to Benton to near Phoenix, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Benton around 1030 PM CDT. Vaughan around 1040 PM CDT. Way around 1045 PM CDT. Canton around 1050 PM CDT. Sharon around 1055 PM CDT. Farmhaven around 1100 PM CDT. Thomastown around 1120 PM CDT. Singleton around 1130 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
